Replace.Text: Nile Divine Realm-Heron
Niro
Tot
Everything is a prelude
Silk and Blade

Get Tot, Osiris and 1 spy (and add 1 spy capacity), workshop +1 spy capacity, spy +14 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. When the offensive spy mission is successful, you will get 1000% of the [ICON_Science] technology value and [ICON_Culture] culture value of the target city for this round. The time to complete all tasks is reduced by 100% and it does not take time to deploy in enemy cities. When counter-espionage is performed, the effect will cover all urban areas and be increased by 100 levels. Trail Blazers, Builders and Spy Purchase Cost -95%. Tott's vision range +1 for each completion of Tech and Municipal Affairs
The same thing will look different in the eyes of different people. For some people, Colge may mean justice and order. But for me... Colge means sacrifice and bitter choice - Tot
convergence
Like a civilization with weak military power
Unit +14[ICON_Gold] Gold Coins
(Nod) I'm ready, let's continue
I'm sorry to refuse
Looking forward to working with you
Don't worry, everything is planned
It doesn't matter, it doesn't matter
Uninvited guests are only the most popular after they leave the venue
Survival or destruction, you don't have to think about it anymore
I have settled the messenger sent, please rest assured
Colgey never accepts any idle staff
Colgee negotiation experts are coming soon, I hope you can receive them well, which will be good for you
Hum, whatever you want
There is no gold in the garbage
oh? A lovely partner joins the long journey...I am Colgee Major Crime Countermeasures Department, Tot. Don't be nervous, I know you don't want to see me often, right?
I'm going to visit Ain Sophie. It's not far from here, so you probably won't refuse, right?
Well, I'm available too
I have never heard of the location you mentioned before. It sounds quite far from here. If you don't mark your location on the map, I will tell you where our location is.
Put away your edge, it will be beneficial to both sides
Before Colgey's patience with you is exhausted, leave here quickly
Your stronghold has affected Colgee's territory
You can continue to act like this at your own risk
It's not that easy to install eyeliner in Colgee
Then you can try again
Can you recall your fallacies?
Nothing to say
Is this the end of the story?
It's a great cooperation, thank you
It's a great cooperation, thank you
It's a great cooperation, thank you
Can't this touch your heart?
Can't this touch your heart?
Can't this touch your heart?
Strong force sometimes poses a threat to others, so it’s good to restrain everyone. You’ve done a good job in this regard.
Tott is very happy to see that you have not developed military power
